text: Christopher John "Topher" Grace (born July 12, 1978) is an American actor. He is best known for playing the main character, Eric Forman, on the long-running Fox sitcom That '70s Show. Grace also played the villain Eddie Brock, Jr. in the movie Spider-Man 3. title: Topher Grace
